metadata.feature_description: Shows server information and system status in a hover-based summary panel.

steps.action: Navigated to the home page and logged in as superuser (host)
steps.actual: Login was successful, PersonaBar displayed on the left side with Evoq logo at the top

steps.action: Hovered over the PersonaBar logo (Evoq logo) at the top of the PersonaBar
steps.expected: Server summary panel appears showing server information
steps.actual: Server summary panel appeared displaying: Product Name (EVOQ ENGAGE), Version (v. 10.01.01 (87)), .NET Framework (4.8), Server Name (EC2AMAZ-2AKAC3I), License Key (Trial), Documentation link, Customer Portal link, Contact Support link, and Logout option

steps.action: Examined the server summary panel content while hovering over the logo
steps.expected: All server metrics display correctly including product name, version, framework, server name
steps.actual: All server information displayed correctly: Product Name (Evoq Engage), Version (v. 10.01.01 (87)), .NET Framework (4.8), Server Name (EC2AMAZ-2AKAC3I - AWS EC2 instance), License Key (Trial), plus links to Documentation (dnnsoftware.com/docs), Customer Portal, and Contact Support

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify summary dismissal on mouse leave

steps.action: Moved the mouse away from the PersonaBar logo to the main content area
steps.actual: Server summary panel was dismissed when mouse left the logo area, PersonaBar returned to its normal collapsed state

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Check summary display on different screen sizes

steps.action: Resized viewport to 768px width (tablet size) and hovered over PersonaBar logo
steps.expected: Server summary panel should display correctly at smaller viewport
steps.actual: Server summary panel displayed correctly at 768px width with all information visible. The panel layout remained intact and all server metrics were readable

steps.action: Resized viewport to 480px width (mobile size) and hovered over PersonaBar logo
steps.expected: Server summary panel should display correctly at mobile viewport
steps.actual: Server summary panel displayed correctly at 480px width with all information visible. All server metrics (Product Name, Version, Framework, Server Name, License, links) remained accessible

observations: The server summary feature uses hoverIntent jQuery plugin with a 200ms timeout for smoother hover interactions
Server Name and Framework Version are only displayed for host/superuser accounts (verified in code: ServerSummaryController.cs checks IsSuperUser)
The summary panel includes additional Evoq-specific links not mentioned in the original DNN core: Documentation, Customer Portal, Contact Support, and a License Key display
The panel position is absolute and positioned at left: 80px to appear next to the PersonaBar
A Logout option is available directly from the server summary panel for quick access
